response.overview: Three young policewomen work in a special unit that carries out undercover investigations. In the current case, they were able to find a website that revealed connections to the disappearance of several young women. While one of the policewomen pretends to be an innocent high school student and tries to contact the alleged perpetrators, her colleagues follow her in order to find the criminals' hideout. The trail leads to a remote clinic. There, the other two law enforcement officers, disguised as a patient and a doctor, are able to infiltrate the scene. But not everything goes according to plan...
response.title: Love² Police
